cancel().Description: Cancel this request and all pending requests for the WebView that had the error.

proceed().Description: Proceed with the SSL certificate. It is not recommended to proceed past SSL errors and this method should generally not be used; see @B_android#webkit#WebViewClient#onReceivedSslError_E@ for more information.

ClassDesc: Represents a request for handling an SSL error. Instances of this class are created by the WebView and passed to @B_android#webkit#WebViewClient#onReceivedSslError_E@. The host application must call either @B_android#webkit#SslErrorHandler#proceed_E@ or @B_android#webkit#SslErrorHandler#cancel_E@ to set the WebView's response to the request.
